title: Crater Lake National Park: The Old Man
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Natural Features & Ecosystems     The Old Man                The Old Man         The Old Man. NPS  The Old Man is a mountain hemlock that has been floating upright in Crater Lake for over 100 years. Wind and lake currents can move the log to any location on the lake.   Â                 The Old Man   8 Photos  Photo gallery of The Old Man.
